verses.verse: The beginning <S%G746><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> prophets, <S%G4396><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> send <S%G649><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> messenger <S%G32><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> face, <S%G4383><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> shall prepare <S%G2680><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> way <S%G3598><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> thee. <S%G4675><s%>

The voice <S%G5456><s%> of one crying <S%G994><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> Prepare <S%G2090><s%> ye the <S%G3588><s%> way <S%G3598><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> his <S%G846><s%> paths <S%G5147><s%> straight. <S%G2117><s%>

John <S%G2491><s%> did <S%G1096><s%> baptize <S%G907><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> preach <S%G2784><s%> the baptism <S%G908><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the remission <S%G859><s%> of sins. <S%G266><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there went out <S%G1607><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> land <S%G5561><s%> of Judea, <S%G2449><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they of Jerusalem, <S%G2415><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were all <S%G3956><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> river <S%G4215><s%> of Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> confessing <S%G1843><s%> their <S%G848><s%> sins. <S%G266><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> clothed with <S%G1746><s%> camel's <S%G2574><s%> hair, <S%G2359><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with a girdle <S%G2223><s%> of a skin <S%G1193><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G848><s%> loins; <S%G3751><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he did eat <S%G2068><s%> locusts <S%G200><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wild <S%G66><s%> honey; <S%G3192><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> preached, <S%G2784><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> There cometh <S%G2064><s%> one <S%G3588><s%> mightier <S%G2478><s%> than I <S%G3450><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> latchet <S%G2438><s%> of whose <S%G848><s%> shoes <S%G5266><s%> I <S%G3739><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G2425><s%> to stoop down <S%G2955><s%> and unloose. <S%G3089><s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> have baptized <S%G907><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> water: <S%G5204><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> shall baptize <S%G907><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Nazareth <S%G3478><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> was baptized <S%G907><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> Jordan. <S%G2446><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> coming up <S%G305><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> water, <S%G5204><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> heavens <S%G3772><s%> opened, <S%G4977><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> like <S%G5616><s%> a dove <S%G4058><s%> descending <S%G2597><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> him: <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there came <S%G1096><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> saying, Thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I am well pleased. <S%G2106><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2117><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> driveth <S%G1544><s%> him <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wilderness. <S%G2048><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wilderness <S%G2048><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> tempted <S%G3985><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> Satan; <S%G4567><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wild beasts; <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> ministered <S%G1247><s%> unto him. <S%G846><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that John <S%G2491><s%> was put in prison, <S%G3860><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> is fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is at hand: <S%G1448><s%> repent <S%G3340><s%> ye, and <S%G2532><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> gospel. <S%G2098><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> as he walked <S%G4043><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> casting <S%G906><s%> a net <S%G293><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sea: <S%G2281><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they were <S%G2258><s%> fishers. <S%G231><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Come <S%G1205><s%> ye after <S%G3694><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I will make <S%G4160><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> to become <S%G1096><s%> fishers <S%G231><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> they forsook <S%G863><s%> their <S%G848><s%> nets, <S%G1350><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had gone <S%G4260><s%> a little farther <S%G3641><s%> thence, <S%G1564><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> son of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> who <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> were in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ship <S%G4143><s%> mending <S%G2675><s%> their nets. <S%G1350><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> he called <S%G2564><s%> them: <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they left <S%G863><s%> their <S%G848><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> Zebedee <S%G2199><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ship <S%G4143><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hired servants, <S%G3411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G565><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they went <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum; <S%G2584><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> on the <S%G3588><s%> sabbath day <S%G4521><s%> he entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> and taught. <S%G1321><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they were astonished <S%G1605><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> doctrine: <S%G1322><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he taught <S%G2258><s%> <S%G1321><s%> them <S%G846><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> one that had <S%G2192><s%> authority, <S%G1849><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> scribes. <S%G1122><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> synagogue <S%G4864><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> an unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit; <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he cried out, <S%G349><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> Let us alone; <S%G1436><s%> what have we to do with thee, <S%G5101><s%> <S%G2254><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4671><s%> thou Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth? <S%G3479><s%> art thou come <S%G2064><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> us? <S%G2248><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> thou art, <S%G1488><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Holy One <S%G40><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Hold thy peace, <S%G5392><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when the <S%G3588><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> had torn <S%G4682><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> he came <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they were all <S%G3956><s%> amazed, <S%G2284><s%> insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> they questioned <S%G4802><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves <S%G848><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> What thing <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> this? <S%G5124><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> doctrine <S%G1322><s%> is this? <S%G3778><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> with <S%G2596><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> commandeth <S%G2004><s%> he even <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they do obey <S%G5219><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> immediately <S%G2117><s%> his <S%G846><s%> fame <S%G189><s%> spread abroad <S%G1831><s%> throughout <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> region round about <S%G4066><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> forthwith, <S%G2112><s%> when they were come <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> they entered <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> of Simon <S%G4613><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Andrew, <S%G406><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John. <S%G2491><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Simon's <S%G4613><s%> wife's mother <S%G3994><s%> lay <S%G2621><s%> sick of a fever, <S%G4445><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> anon <S%G2112><s%> they tell <S%G3004><s%> him <S%G846><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> her. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G4334><s%> and took <S%G2902><s%> her <S%G846><s%> by the <S%G3588><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> and lifted her up; <S%G1453><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fever <S%G4446><s%> left <S%G863><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> she ministered <S%G1247><s%> unto them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> at even, <S%G3798><s%> <S%G1096><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sun <S%G2246><s%> did set, <S%G1416><s%> they brought <S%G5342><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that were diseased, <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2560><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> them that were possessed with devils. <S%G1139><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> gathered together <S%G1996><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> door. <S%G2374><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he healed <S%G2323><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> that were sick <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2560><s%> of divers <S%G4164><s%> diseases, <S%G3554><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cast out <S%G1544><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> devils; <S%G1140><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> suffered <S%G863><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> devils <S%G1140><s%> to speak, <S%G2980><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they knew <S%G1492><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> in the morning, <S%G1773><s%> rising up <S%G450><s%> a great while before day, <S%G3029><s%> <S%G4404><s%> he went out, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> departed <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a solitary <S%G2048><s%> place, <S%G5117><s%> and there <S%G2546><s%> prayed. <S%G4336><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> that were with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%> followed after <S%G2614><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> when they had found <S%G2147><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> they said <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> men seek for <S%G2212><s%> thee. <S%G4571><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Let us go <S%G71><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> next <S%G2192><s%> towns, <S%G2969><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I may preach <S%G2784><s%> there also: <S%G2546><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> therefore <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5124><s%> came I forth. <S%G1831><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he preached <S%G2258><s%> <S%G2784><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> synagogues <S%G4864><s%> throughout <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cast out <S%G1544><s%> devils. <S%G1140><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there came <S%G2064><s%> a leper <S%G3015><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> beseeching <S%G3870><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> kneeling down <S%G1120><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> thou wilt, <S%G2309><s%> thou canst <S%G1410><s%> make me clean. <S%G2511><s%> <S%G3165><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> moved with compassion, <S%G4697><s%> put forth <S%G1614><s%> his hand, <S%G5495><s%> and touched <S%G680><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> I will; <S%G2309><s%> be thou clean. <S%G2511><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> as soon as he <S%G846><s%> had spoken, <S%G2036><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> leprosy <S%G3014><s%> departed <S%G565><s%> from <S%G575><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he was cleansed. <S%G2511><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> he straitly charged <S%G1690><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and forthwith <S%G2112><s%> sent him away; <S%G1544><s%> <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> See <S%G3708><s%> thou say <S%G2036><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> to any man: <S%G3367><s%> but <S%G235><s%> go thy way, <S%G5217><s%> show <S%G1166><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> priest, <S%G2409><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> offer <S%G4374><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> cleansing <S%G2512><s%> those things which <S%G3739><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> commanded, <S%G4367><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> a testimony <S%G3142><s%> unto them. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> went out, <S%G1831><s%> and began <S%G756><s%> to publish <S%G2784><s%> it much, <S%G4183><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to blaze abroad <S%G1310><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> matter, <S%G3056><s%> insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> Jesus <S%G846><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> no more <S%G3371><s%> openly <S%G5320><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> but <S%G235><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> desert <S%G2048><s%> places: <S%G5117><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> from every quarter. <S%G3836><s%>
